EmailTemplate.subject: Join our next live GlobalMeet training course
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
TAKE A TRAINING CLASS WE'RE HERE TO HELP
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I hope you're enjoying your trial of the GlobalMeet service. To help you get the most of the service we would like to invite you to a training session just for new users like you.
In this one hour webinar, you will learn how to:
Use the GlobalMeet Outlook Toolbar to send audio and web meeting invites Join a GlobalMeet web meeting from your toolbar, desktop app, browser or iPad Have the meeting call you from the "Connect Me" feature Use attendee panel controls, share your screen or share files Find important resources and support through the GlobalMeet Community
Pick a date and register for GlobalMeet training today. https://community.globalmeet.com/community/asiapacific
Prefer to self-train? Take a few minutes to watch these tutorials. All are short, informative and easy to follow. http://pages.pgi-email.com/video_tutorials_1/
Questions? As your account manager, I'm here to help you make the most of your service. Contact me today!
Regards, {!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Email} {!User.Phone}
